name: Brothers in Arms
description:
This is a Final Fantasy XV fangame made for the 2020 Chocolate Box Exchange. It is not affiliated in any way with the creators of the original source material. No money is being made off this work and no money should be paid for it, either.

Please also be advised that it features a m/m pairing and one pathway contains NSFW language and description in the text.

Please report any bugs at the AO3 page.
